articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a reply message from Choummaly Sayasone, president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on March 24.
					 The Lao president in his message expressed his deep thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending warm greetings and best wishes on his 80th birthday.
					
					 He said that he was very pleased to see the good traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries steadily growing strong to give substantial benefit to the peoples of the two countries and making contributions to world peace and stability and development of the cooperative relations.
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and steady big success in accomplishing the cause of defending and developing the country.

articles.title: Holiday of Bangladesh Observed
articles.content:
Holiday of Bangladesh Observed
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Monday to mark the 45th anniversary of the Bangladeshi independence.
					 Present there were the chairman of the DPRK-Bangladesh Friendship Association and its members and working people in the city.
					
					 A congratulatory speech was made and a congratulatory message to the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee was adopted in the name of the DPRK-Bangladesh Friendship Association.

articles.title: Young Koreans Determined to Wipe out Provocateurs: Youth League Spokesman
articles.content:
Young Koreans Determined to Wipe out Provocateurs: Youth League Spokesman
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on Monday made public a statement condemning the south Korean group of traitors' "precision striking drill" designed to destroy the office of the DPRK supreme leadership as the height of military provocation and confrontation which even the preceding puppet ruling quarters never imagined.
					 Describing the supreme leadership of the DPRK as the sun of Songun Korea and the destiny of all its servicepersons and people, the statement said:
					
					 The south Korean traitors' reckless moves to have the sun of the Koreans' life and destiny eclipsed are the thrice-cursed provocation against this great entity.
					
					 The young Koreans cannot overlook this shuddering confrontation hysteria any longer.
					
					 The enemies had better properly know that the huge young army of Paektusan, the units of stalwart fighters devotedly defending the leader, is standing guard over the headquarters of the Korean revolution like an invulnerable fortress. 
					
					 There is no need to warn the Park Geun Hye group more dead than alive, keen on confrontation. 
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the Park group show any sign of the operation to hurt the headquarters of the Korean revolution, the young vanguard of the great Paektusan nation will become five million human nuclear bombs protecting the leader to wipe out the outrageous provocateurs to the last man, conclude the showdown with the U.S., accomplish the historic cause of national reunification and thus demonstrate the honor of the youth of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Villains Will Never Be Pardoned: Spokesman for Buddhist Federation of Korea
articles.content:
Villains Will Never Be Pardoned: Spokesman for Buddhist Federation of Korea
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea in a statement Monday denounced the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for openly conducting "beheading operation" and "precision strike drill" targeting the supreme headquarters of the DPRK.
					 The villains' unprecedentedly hideous provocations are touching off the bitter resentment and anger of all the Buddhists in the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Neither nuclear bombs nor "special operation" of the U.S. can ever destroy our earthly paradise and fortress of single-minded unity.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are all out in the decisive battle to win the final victory, their hearts burning with the resolution to devotedly protect the leader. The U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors would be well advised to behave with discretion, properly understanding the spirit and will to annihilate the enemies.
					
					 All the Buddhists in the DPRK will courageously turn out in the sacred all-people battle to throw the aggressors and provocateurs into a hell like cauldron just as great Buddhist priest Sosan replaced the Buddhist alter fittings by weapons and fought the sacred war for wiping out the enemies.
					
					 We express expectation and belief that all the Buddhists in south Korea and overseas who love justice and peace will be well aware of the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the reckless nuclear war hysteria of the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, and the Park Geun Hye group and bravely turn out in the nationwide patriotic resistance to prevent war and preserve peace on this land.

articles.title: Many Achievements Made in Educational Field of DPRK
articles.content:
Many Achievements Made in Educational Field of DPRK
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to improving educational conditions and environment in the field of general secondary education in the DPRK.
					 In recent months alone, nearly 200 classrooms were newly built at 50-odd junior and senior secondary schools, over 1 600 schools renovated or repaired and more than 11 000 classrooms and laboratories spruced up across the country.
					
					 The Education Commission has pushed ahead with the production and supply of school things, taking measures to build new schools and dormitories and repair existing school buildings in close cooperation with support units.
					
					 Over 8 000 classrooms were modernized to be multi-functional ones while the education was put on an IT basis at several hundred schools.

articles.title: Death Penalty to Park Geun Hye Group of Traitors Urged
articles.content:
Death Penalty to Park Geun Hye Group of Traitors Urged
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The long-range artillery force of the Korean People's Army issued an ultimatum to the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea who staged a drill for "striking the leadership" of the DPRK.
					 U Sang Chol, vice-president of the DPRK Supreme Court, told KCNA:
					
					 The reckless military action conducted by Park and her group is the never-to-be-condoned crime.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK already sentenced the group of traitors to death.
					
					 Death penalty is applicable to the group of traitors who dared stage "precision striking drill" aimed to destroy the office of our supreme leadership, not content with nuclear war exercises.
					
					 It is the best to immediately execute the death sentence by means of a stonk of the long-range artillery force.
					
					 Hong Chol Hwa, director of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors committed such military provocation in step with the hostile forces' persistent moves to impose sanctions against the DPRK and stifle it. It is the worst crime never to be pardoned.
					
					 There is no statute of limitations to treason. Moreover, it is quite natural from the viewpoint of international laws to inflict a physical punishment upon those traitors for hurting the dignity of our supreme leadership.
					
					 If the Park group of traitors disobeys the last warning to make an official apology to all Koreans in the north, south and abroad, the Paektusan army will mete out severest punishment to them.

articles.title: KCNA Demands Immediate Cancellation of Ridiculous Confab against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Demands Immediate Cancellation of Ridiculous Confab against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the 4th "Nuclear Security Summit" would be held in the U.S.
					 The summit is a product of the despicable plot hatched by Obama to give the international community impression that he would immediately start the work for putting into practice the much touted initiative "for building a world without nuclear weapons" made in April of 2009.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the summit sponsored by the U.S. is a mockery and hypocrisy towards the world public desirous of building the world without nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. is undoubtedly revealing its true colors as a harasser of the world peace by conducting ceaseless new nuclear tests under the signboard of "a world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 It is preposterous for the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state and its only criminal who used them in the past, to host such summit. It is, therefore, a serious insult to the people desirous of the world peace and security.
					
					 The summit is nothing but a fig-leaf for covering up the U.S. arbitrary and high-handed nuclear activities.
					
					 The U.S., in particular, has resorted to ceaseless nuclear blackmail and threat to the DPRK, deepening the nuclear crisis on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is chiefly to blame for proliferating nukes as it has massively shipped nuclear hardware into south Korea. The U.S. military bases in south Korea have a huge stockpile of nuclear weapons of more than ten types including nuclear missiles, bombs and mines. It has staged nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK by introducing nuclear carriers, submarines, bombers, etc. into south Korea and its vicinity. It is thus escalating its nuclear blackmail and threat to an extreme phase.
					
					 The U.S. is now staging the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises with the south Korean warmongers with huge troops and all type nuclear war hardware involved. This clearly proves that the U.S. is, indeed, a nuclear maniac without an equal.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group are going to use the above-said summit as a means for ratcheting up the sanctions against the DPRK, finding fault with its legitimate access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. hosted the 1st "Nuclear Security Summit in 2010 at which it made "closer cooperation in the campaign for pressurizing the DPRK to dismantle its nukes topic of discussion, reducing it to a war confab of the nuclear maniacs.
					
					 It also held the 2nd summit in south Korea in 2012, the ground for exhibiting its nuclear weapons, turning it into a platform for internationalizing the anti-DPRK nuclear racket and mayhem. It was by no means fortuitous that the international community ridiculed the summit as an anti-alcohol assembly at a brewery.
					
					 The U.S. is going to host a "nuclear security summit" again at a time when the news of the DPRK's series of measures for bolstering up its nuclear force is reported by world media. This is nothing but the last-ditch effort to deter the DPRK from bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense at any cost.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the U.S. and its followers to hold such nonsensical summit against the DPRK instead of paying heed to the just demand for boldly recognizing it as a nuclear power and opting for dialogue with it. This is an unpardonable criminal act.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear force will steadily grow at the speed desired by the Workers' Party of Korea according to the goal set by it as long as the U.S. hostile policy towards it persists.
					
					 The 4th "Nuclear Security Summit" will leave a blot on history as the most shameful international conference.
					
					 The U.S. should not waste time by holding a futile confab against the DPRK but seek such realistic solution as rolling back its hostile policy toward the latter.

articles.title: Nobody Can Block DPRK's Advance: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nobody Can Block DPRK's Advance: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The solemn declaration of the construction of Ryomyong Street is a clear answer of Songun Korea to the frantic provocation of the aggressors, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group of traitors have gone to extremes in their military provocations. It is unthinkable, in a common sense, to mobilize many service personnel for the peaceful construction under this tense situation.
					
					 High-rise apartment houses will spring up in Ryomyong Street like mushrooms after rain before long through self-reliance and self-development. This represents the mode of the struggle of the Korean people to foil the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and bring earlier a rosy future.
					
					 Self-reliance and self-development mean the steadfast principle adhered to by the DPRK in winning victories along the road of Juche and the source of eternal vitality guaranteeing the bright future of the generations to come.
					
					 The efforts for self-development serve as the strongest weapon that the hostile forces fear most as they are displeased with the DPRK's advance and its achievements.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S.-groomed south Korean traitors calculate they can hold in check the DPRK's advance, while getting ever more frantic with harsh "sanctions" against it in collusion with their master. 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors should bear in mind that neither "sanctions" nor pressure of the U.S. and its followers can ever work on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK advancing in the spirit of Mallima by dint of science and technology will with its own efforts make a faster and more dynamic advance, decisively frustrating the "sanctions" of the hostile forces, and bring about a happier life.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Security Legislation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Security Legislation
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The security legislation will reportedly take effect in Japan soon. In this regard Abe blustered that the enforcement of the law would make a more positive contribution to the peace and stability of the region and the international community and it would be of "historic importance".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 It is sophism of the Japanese reactionaries that the security legislation is certainly necessary for preserving "peace" and "security" in Japan and, furthermore, in other parts of the world.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are working hard to veil the security legislation with such rhetoric as "peace" and "security", but they can not cover up its danger.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the security legislation is a war law for overseas aggression.
					
					 Why are they justifying the security legislation despite the unanimous opposition of the public at home and abroad?
					
					 Their ulterior intention is to launch reinvasion at any cost, backed by the U.S. Their scenario has already entered the phase of its implementation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are rushing headlong into carrying out it, seized with the daydream that they can become the "leader" of the Orient through the enforcement of the war law. 
					
					 Only pitfall of destruction awaits the running militarist chariot of Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S.-led "Nuclear Security Summit" Hypocritical One
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S.-led "Nuclear Security Summit" Hypocritical One
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the 4th "Nuclear Security Summit" would be held in the U.S. soon.
					 The Park Geun Hye group is taking this as a good chance to stir up the atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S.-led "Nuclear Security Summit" is a mockery and hypocrisy towards the public desirous of building a world without nuclear weapons.
					
					 If the nuclear issue is to be discussed, the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers should be called into question and censured.
					
					 But the reality is quite contrary to this.
					
					 The "Nuclear Security Summit" will certainly turn out to be a sinister confab for hurting and slandering the DPRK which had access to deterrent for self-defence to cope with the ceaseless nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists. Its objective is, indeed, against the will of humankind.
					
					 Such warmongers as Obama and Park would be main players of the "summit." It, therefore, will be nothing but a fig-leaf for covering up the arbitrary and high-handed nuclear activities of the U.S. and the moves of the pro-U.S. lackeys for a nuclear war against the DPRK. That's why the "summit" will only leave the most shameful blot in the history of international conferences.
					
					 With no gimmick can the tricksters conceal their true colors as disturbers of the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula and maniacs keen to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: Last Outlet of Park Geun Hye Group Is only Apology; Minju Joson
articles.content:
Last Outlet of Park Geun Hye Group Is only Apology; Minju Joson
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Today all the service personnel and people of the DPRK hold Marshal Kim Jong Un, great sun of Songun, in high esteem as their life and destiny and rosy future.
					 But worst traitor Park Geun Hye and her group are committing only the most unpardonable crimes in the world daring defile and attempt to do harm to the sacred dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 This prompts the mounting retaliatory will of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army waiting for an order for a preemptive strike to wipe out the enemy as well as the surging anger of the Korean people.
					
					 The long-range artillery force of the large combined unit of the Korean People's Army on the front conducted a drill which turned the imaginary bases of the enemy keen on provocation into a sea of flames in a flash with the simultaneous firing that rocked the earth and sky.
					
					 The simultaneous firing of our long-range artillery force is an eruption of the irrepressible hatred and wrath of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK, who turned out as one in the struggle for devotedly defending the leader, at the U.S. imperialists and Park Geun Hye group, and a declaration signaling the most miserable and wretched final end of the aggressors and provokers.
					
					 There is no place in the earth where those running amuck daring attempt to hurt the dignity of our supreme leadership can shelter.
					
					 A formal apology to all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad for daring commit high treason is the only way for Park Geun Hye to escape from merciless strike of our powerful revolutionary army.
					
					 Time is not enough and opportunity is not always available.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Exasperated with Purchase of F-35s
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Exasperated with Purchase of F-35s
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea was caught in an embarrassing position over the issue of purchasing U.S.-made F-35 fighter jets.
					 According to the south Korean KBS, it was told at a hearing of the U.S. House of Representatives on March 23 that F-35s have many defects.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Take Prudent Approach toward KPA's Ultimatum
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Take Prudent Approach toward KPA's Ultimatum
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea should take prudent approach toward the ultimatum recently issued by the long-range artillery force of the large combined unit on the front of the Korean People's Army.
					 This is the last advice of army and people in the DPRK.
					
					 Yun Myong Song, an officer of the KPA, told KCNA:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors will have to face a deadly strike from the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, if it refuses to apologize to all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad for its high treason and openly punish those who worked out an "operation for striking the leadership" of the DPRK, seeking to carry it into practice.
					
					 The ultimatum is just the last warning made by the DPRK army and people.
					
					 The supreme leadership of the DPRK represents the life and destiny of all its people. Anyone who dared hurt its dignity can never survive in this plant.
					
					 If the Park group refuses to accept the ultimatum, the dens of plot-breeders and aggression forces would be reduced to ashes at once.
					
					 Ro Chol Su, vice-director of the National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, said the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership is like the sun that can never be eclipsed.
					
					 The Park group of traitors has no other choice but to accept the ultimatum. If it does not respond to the ultimatum, the Chongwadae and other ruling machines in south Korea will face the merciless shelling of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Hwang Myong Chol, director of the History Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 The Park group of traitors should be mindful that they are within the intensive striking range of the KPA.
					
					 Its refusal to accept the ultimatum will only trigger off the annihilating strikes from the KPA that lead the provokers to a miserable death.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Vows to Struggle against Park Geun Hye Group of Traitors
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Vows to Struggle against Park Geun Hye Group of Traitors
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on March 26 and called for struggling against the dictatorship of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					 Speakers at the meeting deplored the pitiful situation despite the organization's struggle for the release of the prisoners of conscience and independent reunification for several decades.
					
					 They called for winning a victory by achieving the turn-out of 200 000 people for victory over the dictatorship of the Park regime.
					
					 Then the organization released a resolution.
					
					 It underscored the need to struggle to the end by carrying forward the spirit of martyrs who struggled for democracy, peace and reunification.

articles.title: Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded by Russian, Czech Organizations
articles.content:
Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded by Russian, Czech Organizations
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Russian and Czech organizations released statements on March 21 and 22 censuring Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet army.
					 The Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia said:
					
					 We urge the U.S. and south Korean authorities to immediately stop their heinous joint military drills harassing peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 GIs should withdraw from south Korea.
					
					 We fully support all the measures being taken by the DPRK for safeguarding its sovereignty.
					
					 The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association said:
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills are a prelude to a war against the DPRK.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to stop its war moves bringing a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula at once.

articles.title: Bulgarian Figure Hopes for Peace on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Bulgarian Figure Hopes for Peace on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- We hope that the tension and confrontation would be defused as soon as possible and lasting peace would settle on the Korean peninsula.
					 The chief of Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia said this in a statement on March 19.
					
					 Terming the UN Security Council's vicious "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK utterly illegal and unjust, she went on:
					
					 Due to the U.S. and south Korean authorities' despicable and unpardonable acts, the situation on the Korean peninsula is getting worse.
					
					 We strongly condemn the south Korean authorities for aggravating tensions on the peninsula in collusion with outsiders and stoking confrontation with the north.
					
					 The U.S. should halt its all provocative rackets against the DPRK immediately and withdraw its forces of aggression from south Korea.

articles.title: DR Congolese Body Observes Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
DR Congolese Body Observes Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of DR Congo for celebrating the Day of the Sun (President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary) released a bulletin "April 15, 2016, 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung" on March 12.
					 The bulletin edited articles titled "Founder of Juche idea, Songun idea", "Believing in people as in heaven" and "Marshal Kim Jong Un praised by the people".
					
					 The articles said that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, Songun idea and perfectly embodied them in the whole period of the protracted revolutionary struggle.
					
					 The Juche idea, Songun idea serve as the immortal banner, perfect and encyclopedic revolutionary theory that guarantees the successful advance of the cause of human independence, they said, adding:
					
					 The President always found himself among the people, lent his ears to their voice and mapped out lines and policies in keeping with their aspirations and demand and left sacred marks everywhere in the country.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who devoted himself to the people, is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressives as their benevolent father.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Serbia
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Belgrade on March 22.
					 Marijann Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events such as a lecture and seminar to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung from March 24 to April 15.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Tajikistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Tajikistan
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Dushanbe, Tajikistan on March 22.
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events such as a celebration to praise the exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Romania
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 21.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to set the celebration period from March 25 to April 15 and hold political and cultural events such as a celebration, seminar, lecture, book and photo exhibition and film show to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung in that period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Karelia on March 21.
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to send a congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize colorful political and cultural events for praising the exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 It also decided to release a statement supporting the just measures taken by the DPRK in view of the prevailing situation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Jik's Idea Will Be Immortal: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Jik's Idea Will Be Immortal: Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on a website an article titled "Kim Hyong Jik's Idea of Jiwon (Aim High)"on March 21.
					 The article referred to the fact that Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, devoted his all to the country's independence, regarding the idea of Jiwon as his lifelong motto.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik's ardent desire for liberating Korea was successfully realized by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, Songun idea by applying the noble idea of Jiwon to the Korean revolution, indicated its path and achieved the historical cause of liberating the country through the 20 odd year-long arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into an invincible power no one dares provoke under the uplifted banner of Songun true to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung, and ushered in a fresh era of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Today the DPRK is making leaps forward to emerge as a highly civilized socialist nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik's idea of Jiwon will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted on Irkutskblogspot. ru, a website in Irkutsk of Russia on March 21.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course covered by it to take care of the people's destiny and lead the Korean revolution to a victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A photo of Kim Jong Un was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Jovenes coreanos exterminaran por completo a todos provocadores, senala UJS
articles.content:
Jovenes coreanos exterminaran por completo a todos provocadores, senala UJS
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 28, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung condeno que Park Geun-hye y su banda perpetraron hasta el "simulacro de golpe con precision" contra la oficina de la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lo cual es el climax de la provocacion militar y de las maniobras conflictivas, nunca imaginados ni por los gobernantes surcoreanos anteriores, y prosigue:
					Nuestra Direccion Suprema es el Sol de Corea del Songun y el cielo de destino de todos los uniformados y civiles.
					
					Los imprudentes actos de Park Geun-hye y su banda tendentes a eclipsar el Sol de nuestra vida y nuestro destino devienen una provocacion de categoria especial desafiante a ese gran ente vivo.
					
					Nosotros, los jovenes coreanos, no podemos estar con brazos cruzados ante la furia conflictiva de la horda traidora.
					
					Los enemigos deben saber correctamente que la unidad valiente de la defensa a ultranza al lider, gran destacamento de jovenes del monte Paektu, esta formando una fortaleza inexpugnable en torno a nuestra Direccion de la revolucion.
					
					Ya no se necesita mas una advertencia para la horda de Park Geun-hye, banda de cadaveres vivos enloquecida en la confrontacion.
					
					Si los yanquis y los compinches de Park muestran un minimo indicio de movimiento contra la Direccion Suprema de nuestra Revolucion, los jovenes vanguardistas de la potencia del monte Paektu se convertiran en 5 millones de bombas nucleares para defender con la vida al lider y exterminaran despiadadamente a los provocadores. De esta manera, acabaran con la batalla conflictiva antiyanqui en nombre de la juventud de Corea del Songun y lograran sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: FBC denuncia simulacros anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
FBC denuncia simulacros anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea (FBC) hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion denunciando la "operacion de decapitacion" y los "ejercicios de ataque con precision" de EE.UU. y la banda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye contra la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Esta tremenda provocacion sin precedente de la horda de malvados causa gran indignacion de todos los budistas de la RPDC, senala la nota y continua:
					
					La RPDC, paraiso de budistas y fortaleza de la unidad monolitica, es inquebrantable por las bombas nucleares ni por las "operaciones especiales" de toda indole de EE.UU. 
					
					EE.UU. y la banda traidora surcoreana deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta del temperamento y voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de defender a ultranza al lider. 
					
					Todos los budistas de la RPDC deben levantarse con valentia en la sagrada guerra de todo el pueblo por sepultar a los  agresores y provocadores, como lo hizo el bonzo Sosan.
					
					Expresamos la esperanza y seguridad de que todos los budistas del Sur de Corea y en ultramar que aman la justicia y la paz se levanten en la lucha patriotica pannacional para prevenir la guerra y preservar la paz en este territorio coreano dandose clara cuenta de las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de la imprudente locura de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano, y la horda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye.

articles.title: Debe ser cancelada conspiracion anti-RPDC, insiste ACNC
articles.content:
Debe ser cancelada conspiracion anti-RPDC, insiste ACNC
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, se efectuara en EE.UU. la 4a "cumbre de seguridad nuclear".
					Esta reunion internacional es el producto de vil artimana inventada por Obama en abril de 2009, para enganar la sociedad internacional como si iniciara de inmediato la ejecucion del proyecto sobre el "mundo libre de armas nucleares".
					
					Reafirmamos que esta cumbre auspiciada por EE.UU. deviene la burla y engano a la opinion publica interior y exterior aspirante al mundo sin armas nucleares.
					
					Bajo la cobertura del "mundo libre de armas nucleares", EE.UU. demuestra totalmente su caracter perverso de destructor de la paz mundial, realizando sucesivamente nuevas pruebas nucleares.
					
					Es una absurdidad lo que EE.UU., mayor pais poseedor de armas nucleares y unico pais criminal nuclear en el mundo, sesiona tal reunion y tambien es el insulto grave al anhelo de los pueblos por la paz y seguridad del mundo.
					
					La "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" no pasa de ser una mascara para ocultar la arbitrariedad y la coaccion nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. vino agravando la crisis nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana al amenazar y chantajear con armas nucleares a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El imperio es el autor de la proliferacion nuclear en el Sur de Corea. Aun ahora, en las bases de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea esta emplazada una gran cantidad de armas nucleares de mas de 10 tipos como misiles, bombas y minas nucleares. Y los yanquis exacerban la amenaza y chantaje nucleares para presionar a la RPDC, al introducir en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana y el suelo surcoreano, los portaaviones, submarinos y bombarderos y otros armas nucleares.
					
					Hoy en dia, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos libran los ejercicios conjuntos militares Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 de maximo tamano en la historia y movilizan gran cantidad de sus  efectivos y todos los bienes de guerra nuclear. Esto comprueba claramente que EE.UU. es precisamente fanatico nuclear sin par.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana cuestionan la justa posesion nuclear de la RPDC y abusan de la "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" como medio de presion para fortalecer la sancion anti-RPDC.
					
					En 2010, EE.UU. presidio la primera "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" y la convirtio, de rabo en cabo, en una reunion de conspiracion belica de los maniacos nucleares poniendo sobre el tapete el fortalecimiento de "cooperacion" nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					Y organizo la segunda en 2012 en el Sur de Corea, lugar de exhibicion de armas nucleares norteamericanas, y la transformo tambien en la escena caotica para internacionalizar el alboroto nuclear anti-RPDC. No es de ninguna manera fortuito que la sociedad internacional la califico de reunion sesionada en la fabrica de licores para protestar la bebida alcoholica.
					
					En la actualidad, se reportan sucesivamente las noticias sobre el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC. Precisamente en estos momentos, el imperio yanqui sesiona de nuevo la "cumbre de seguridad nuclear", lo cual deviene ultimos esfuerzos desesperados para impedir por todos los medios el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC.
					
					En lugar de prestar oidos a la voz de la justicia de reconocer audazmente la RPDC como potencia nuclear y emprender conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU., este pais criminal nuclear de categoria especial y sus satelites intentan desarrollar el complot vano contra la RPDC desempenando el papel de padrinos de Obama. Esto es el crimen nunca perdonable.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. continue la politica de hostilidad, las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC se aumentaran y se fortaleceran de manera mas vigorosa segun la meta y la velocidad fijadas por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Junto con la retirada de Obama, la 4a "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" dejara mala reputacion en la historia como reunion internacional mas vergonzosa.
					
					EE.UU. debera buscar la alternativa realista tales como la retirada de la politica de hostilidad, en vez de malgastar la fuerza y matar tiempo por la conspiracion inutil contra la RPDC.

articles.title: Se renuevan en RPDC ambiente y condiciones de ensenanza media general
articles.content:
Se renuevan en RPDC ambiente y condiciones de ensenanza media general
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se impulsan activamente los trabajos destinados a mejorar completamente las condiciones y el ambiente de la ensenanza secundaria general.
					Durante unos meses ultimos, fueron construidas cerca de 200 aulas en mas de 50 escuelas secundarias basicas y superiores y remodeladas y reparadas mas de 1 600 escuelas en todo el pais.
					
					Mas de 11 mil aulas y salas de ensayo y practica cambiaron por completo su fisonomia.
					
					El Comite de Educacion toma medidas para construir en corto tiempo las escuelas, aulas y albergues y reparar los edificios escolares existentes.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, impulsa las labores para producir y suministrar a tiempo los materiales de construccion y equipamientos escolares haciendo fortalecer el papel de las entidades patrocinadoras.
					
					Por otra parte, se elevan mas las atenciones sociales al dominio educativo.
					
					En la ciudad de Pyongyang se realizan a porfia las remodelaciones de escuelas y se efectua la exhibicion de apoyo a la educacion en la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					
					Esta en marcha el trabajo para modernizar los establecimientos de educacion y los aparatos de ensayo y practica, dotar las clases con las multifunciones e informatizar todo el curso de ensenanza y experimentos y practicas.
					
					Ya mas de 8 mil aulas de varias localidades se convirtieron en las multifuncionales y mas de 3 mil salas de ensayo y practica fueron modernizadas. Por su resultado, cientos de escuelas realizaron en alto nivel la informatizacion de la ensenanza.
					
					La RPDC no escatima las inversiones estatales a la educacion, considerandola como labor importante para impulsar el desarrollo del pais.

articles.title: "Cumbre de seguridad nuclear" bajo iniciativa de EE.UU. es burla a opinion publica, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Cumbre de seguridad nuclear" bajo iniciativa de EE.UU. es burla a opinion publica, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Dicen que se convocara pronto la IV "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" en Estados Unidos. La banda de Park Geun-hye trata de aprovecharla para crear un ambiente de confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Esta reunion deviene la burla y el engano a los pueblos del mundo que aspiran un mundo libre de las armas nucleares.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Si quieren discutir el problema nuclear, hay que cuestionar y condenar primeramente la amenaza de la guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos.
					
					Pero, dicha cumbre se convirtio en el lugar de complot para denigrar y calumniar a la RPDC que poseyo el disuasivo de autodefensa frente a la incesante amenaza nuclear de los imperialistas yanquis.
					
					La "cumbre de seguridad nuclear" que se realizara bajo la iniciativa de Obama, Park Geun-hye y otros maniacos de la guerra nuclear, no pasa de ser una mascara para encubrir la arbitrariedad y coaccion nuclear de EE.UU. y la conspiracion de los traidores proyanquis destinada a provocar la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Por esta razon, esta reunion dejara solo la reputacion de la mas vergonzosa reunion internacional.
					
					Los intrigantes nunca podran encubrir su naturaleza sucia de impedidor de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y maniaco de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson exige a Park Geun-hye pedir disculpas ante toda la nacion coreana
articles.content:
Minju Joson exige a Park Geun-hye pedir disculpas ante toda la nacion coreana
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hoy dia, todos los militares y civiles coreanos enaltecen al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Sol de Songun, como futuro radiante de todos los coreanos confinandole toda su vida y destino.
					Sin embargo, la peor traidora Park Geun-hye y sus compinches se atreven a denigrar la sagrada dignidad suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Esto hace mas fuerte la voluntad de venganza del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu que espera la orden de golpe preventivo contra los enemigos y redobla la indignacion de nuestro pueblo contra ellos.
					
					Asi senala el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 28, y continua:
					
					El entrenamiento de la artilleria de largo alcance de la gran unidad combinada del Ejercito Popular de Corea convirtio en un abrir y cerrar de ojos los supuestos nidos de provocacion enemigos en el mar de fuego.
					
					El entrenamiento es la explosion del odio y la colera de todos los militares y civiles coreanos contra el imperialismo estadounidense y la banda de Park Geun-hye y deviene una declaracion que preanuncia a los agresores y provocadores el fin mas catastrofico.
					
					En este planeta no hay lugar donde puedan esconderse los que insultan atrevidamente la maxima dignidad del pueblo coreano.
					
					Si Park no quiere recibir el fuego despiadado del ejercito revolucionario, debe pedir disculpas oficiales ante todos los connacionales del Norte, el Sur y en el ultramar por sus  crimenes traidores sin precedentes.
					
					No le queda mucho tiempo.
					
					Tampoco tiene la oportunidad en cualquier momento.
